title: State of Anivia
body: Hi riot in the last couple of patches Anivia has been the subject of some pretty hard nerfs that personally i don't think she needed so riot i'm asking if your gonna make her unplayable which you have done please just rework her. {{champion:34}} {{summoner:14}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
In lane it will  do 1.25AP +  280 Base damage.  That is two ticks of ult and her empowered E. (this is at level 6)

Level 6 you will have 70APish,  so thats 400 damage.. 



If you are talking late game Anivia doing high amounts of damage, EVERY mage will do that.
Couple patches? you retard this first time she been touched in a while, and she been broken for that long while, she need it.
